response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet your high standards and expectations. Given its unique value and quality, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its true worth and your anticipated benefit, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects the product's superior quality and the opportunity for you to enjoy its benefits without breaking the bank. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of enhancing your experience with this remarkable product.", "product_price": 9500}
